get.description:
Get the detail of a transaction given the transaction hash.

Provide the param "hash" or ("block_number" and "tx_index"). If both params are provided,
"hash" will be used.

parameters.description: chain network id, see [list of details](/platform/features/api/web3-api)

schema.title: Chain Id
schema.description: chain network id, see [list of details](/platform/features/api/web3-api)

parameters.name: chain_id

parameters.description: The transaction hash

schema.title: Hash
schema.description: The transaction hash

parameters.name: hash

parameters.description: Block number of the transaction

schema.title: Block Number
schema.description: Block number of the transaction

parameters.name: block_number

parameters.description: Index of the transaction

schema.title: Tx Index
schema.description: Index of the transaction

parameters.name: tx_index
